Invocation Name: happy music
Developer Terms of Use
des:
It helps you create an ambience of relaxation and meditation regardless of the location or time!

It relaxes your body and mind to reduce stress and make you feel better!

This is the perfect musical accompaniment for meditation, yoga, tai chi, healing and complete relaxation.

More Info:

Relaxing Sounds are the perfect to help you with deep sleep, meditation, and relaxation. It is the best sounds for stress relief. Our calm and relaxing sleep music can be used as background sounds, meditation music, relaxation music, peaceful music and as a sleep sounds. Let the soothing and calming sounds help you relax.
priv:

The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
